title: Refund Policy
content:

We value trust and transparency while supporting artisan livelihoods.

Returns & Refunds

  • Due to the handmade and perishable nature of certain products, returns are accepted only for damaged, defective, or incorrect items.
  • Requests must be raised within 48 hours of delivery.

Non-Returnable Items

  • Food products & consumables
  • Customized or made-to-order items
  • Used or altered products

Refund Process

  • Once approved, refunds will be processed within 7‚Äì10 business days.
  • Refunds will be credited to the original payment method.

Replacement

Where possible, we may offer a replacement instead of a refund.
